message: Let's start fair. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. We can negotiate further if you'd like.
I'll start with a 50/50 split. Let's see if we can do better.
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a little more than a 50/50 split. I'll take 5500 and you can have 4500.  We both know inflation is hurting us, and this offer gives us a fair deal.
I'll give you a bit more, but I need to make up for the lost value due to inflation. This way, we'll both get a slightly better deal than before.
